import TemplateGrid from "../../../components/TemplateGrid.astro";
import data from "../../../content/config/templates.json";

<TemplateGrid
  templates={Object.entries(data.nextjs).map(([id, template]) => ({
    id,
    ...template,
  }))}
/>
